name: Floruit Labs
tag_list: enterprise, collaboration, saas, product-development, development, on-demand, startup, portal, change-management, requirements-management, dashboard, knowledge-management
overview:
Floruit Labs is an innovative software provider that empowers large-enterprise companies to collaboratively manage the technology product lifecycle through a cloud-based, SaaS solution.

Floruit Labs’ Pond provides an integrated portal for information, change and workflow management designed to support a range of activities including:

  • Software / Hardware Development
  • Creative Development
  • Test Management
  • Quality Assurance
  • Product R&D

By providing development teams with a customizable portal for collaborative development, Floruit Labs aims to help organizations accomplish more with less — increase their productivity and product quality, while reducing development costs.
